p: Since the 1980s, pioneers have focused on the issues of HIVDR [ 17] and technical protocols for HIVDR have been gradually developed with sustained efforts. China has also compiled professional standards such as “Monitoring Strategies and Detection Techniques of HIVDR” to facilitate the comparison and application of various findings. From 2014 to 2016, 1793, 6005, and 6074 of HIV/AIDS patients receiving ART were examined for HIV-1 VL in Chengdu. HIV-1 pol genes of 481 samples were sequenced in this study, and thus, HIV-1 subtypes, the prevalence of DR, and profiles of DRMs were investigated.
